info.title: Sales Order (A2X)
info.description:
In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:

* You can read entire sales orders or only parts of the data, using the provided filters.

* You can create sales orders. You can use deep insert requests, that is, you create a header plus at least one of the following entities: header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

* For existing sales orders, you can create the following sub-entities on their own: header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

* For existing sales orders, you can update the following entities (that is, you can change the content of their properties): header, header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

* For existing sales orders, you can delete the following entities: header partner, header pricing element, header text, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

For every operation, you can call the API in a synchronous or asynchronous mode. In an asynchronous mode, you can fetch the response from a separate URL later.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, and update sales orders with this OData V4 API

values.text: [Opportunity-to-Order with Third-Party Sales Force Automation Apps (Deprecated)(1QI)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1QI " Link To BP ")
[B2B Order Fulfillment with SAP Commerce Cloud(2TY)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2TY " Link To BP ")
[SAP Customer Experience Entities with SAP Service and Sales Cloud(6KO)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6KO " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Sales: Sales Document Item (SD_SALESDOCITEM)
* Sales: Sales Document (SD_SALESDOC)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET SalesOrder HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
